entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
